title: Eloquent JavaScript
author: Marijn Haverbeke
description: A modern introduction to programming using JavaScript.

title: You Don't Know JS (ES6+)
author: Kyle Simpson
description: Deep dive into core mechanisms of the JavaScript language.

title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
author: Douglas Crockford
description: A classic book that identifies the elegant parts of JavaScript.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Guidelines and best practices for writing readable, maintainable code.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt
description: Tips and techniques for pragmatic software development.
